core-loaders.name: core-loaders
core-loaders.description:
Loaders module includes tools to be able to load configuration found in
core and plugins.

core-migration.name: core-migration
core-migration.description: Provides functions to execute migration script.

core-models.name: core-models
core-models.description: Models module includes all core models.

core-plugin.name: core-plugin
core-plugin.description: The Core plugin with its APIs.

core-providers.name: core-providers
core-providers.description: Providers module includes all core providers.

core-servers.name: core-servers
core-servers.description: Servers module includes all different servers defined by openveo (HTTP and Web Socket).

ApplicationController.name: ApplicationController
ApplicationController.description: Defines an entity controller to handle requests relative to the Web Service client applications and scopes.

authenticationController.name: authenticationController
authenticationController.description: Defines a controller to handlerequests relative to back end authentication.

DefaultController.name: DefaultController
DefaultController.description: Defines a controller to handle request relative to AngularJS single page application.

ErrorController.name: ErrorController
ErrorController.description: Defines a controller to handle errors.

GroupController.name: GroupController
GroupController.description: Defines an entity controller to handle requests relative to groups' entities.

I18nController.name: I18nController
I18nController.description: Defines a controller to handle requests relative to internationalization.

MenuController.name: MenuController
MenuController.description: Defines a controller to handle requests relative to the back end menu.

OauthController.name: OauthController
OauthController.description: Defines a controller to handle requests relative to Web Service authentication.

RoleController.name: RoleController
RoleController.description: Defines an entity controller to handle requests relative to roles' entities.

TaxonomyController.name: TaxonomyController
TaxonomyController.description: Defines an entity controller to handle requests relative to taxonomies' entities.

UserController.name: UserController
UserController.description: Defines an entity controller to handle requests relative to users' entities.

entityLoader.name: entityLoader
entityLoader.description: Provides functions to interpret entities definition from plugin's configuration.

migrationLoader.name: migrationLoader
migrationLoader.description: Provides functions to load migration script.

namespaceLoader.name: namespaceLoader
namespaceLoader.description: Provides functions to load namespaces from core and plugins configuration.

permissionLoader.name: permissionLoader
permissionLoader.description:
Provides functions to interpret permissions definition from core and plugins.

Permissions comes from 2 different things :
 - Core and plugin's configuration files
 - Groups of users which are entities

pluginLoader.name: pluginLoader
pluginLoader.description: Provides functions to load openveo plugins.

routeLoader.name: routeLoader
routeLoader.description:
Provides functions to load routes from core and plugins
configuration.

migrationProcess.name: migrationProcess
migrationProcess.description: Provides functions to execute migration script.

ClientModel.name: ClientModel
ClientModel.description: Defines a ClientModel to manipulate Web Service client applications.

GroupModel.name: GroupModel
GroupModel.description: Defines a GroupModel to manipulate groups.

RoleModel.name: RoleModel
RoleModel.description: Defines a RoleModel to manipulate user roles for back end permissions.

TaxonomyModel.name: TaxonomyModel
TaxonomyModel.description: Defines a TaxonomyModel to manipulate taxonomies.

TokenModel.name: TokenModel
TokenModel.description: Defines a TokenModel to manipulate tokens for Web Service authentication.

UserModel.name: UserModel
UserModel.description: Defines a UserModel to manipulate back end users.

accessToken.name: accessToken
accessToken.description: Provides functions to interface oauth tokens and openveo Web Service.

client.name: client
client.description: Provides functions to interface oauth clients and openveo Web Service.

CorePlugin.name: CorePlugin
CorePlugin.description:
Defines the Core Plugin.

In some way, the core act just like any other plugins, it has a 3 routers (public, private and web service) and
a configuration file. Core plugin can be loaded just like any plugin.

CorePluginApi.name: CorePluginApi
CorePluginApi.description: Defines the Core Plugin API exposed to other plugins.

ClientProvider.name: ClientProvider
ClientProvider.description: Defines a ClientProvider to get and save Web Service client applications.

GroupProvider.name: GroupProvider
GroupProvider.description: Defines a GroupProvider to get and save content groups.

RoleProvider.name: RoleProvider
RoleProvider.description: Defines a RoleProvider to get and save back end user roles.

TaxonomyProvider.name: TaxonomyProvider
TaxonomyProvider.description: Defines a TaxonomyProvider to get and save taxonomies.

TokenProvider.name: TokenProvider
TokenProvider.description: Defines a TokenProvider to get and save Web Service tokens.

UserProvider.name: UserProvider
UserProvider.description: Defines a UserProvider to get and save back end users.

ApplicationServer.name: ApplicationServer
ApplicationServer.description: Defines an HTTP server for the openveo application, which serves front and back end pages.

Server.name: Server
Server.description:
Defines an HTTP Server. This Class must not be used directly,
instead use one of the sub classes.

WebServiceServer.name: WebServiceServer
WebServiceServer.description: Defines an HTTP server for the web service.

api.name: api
api.description: API manipulates the list of loaded plugins and exposes their APIs.

HTTP_ERRORS.name: HTTP_ERRORS
HTTP_ERRORS.description:
The list of HTTP errors with, for each error, its associated
hexadecimal code and HTTP return code.
HTTP errors are sent by {{#crossLinkModule "controllers"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}.
example:
var httpErrors = process.require('app/server/httpErrors.js');
    console.log(httpErrors.UNKNOWN_ERROR);

path.name: path
path.description: Provides functions to manipulate HTTP paths handled by the server.

storage.name: storage
storage.description: Storage is a global context for the core.

classitems.description: Gets the list of scopes and return it as a JSON object.
classitems.name: getScopesAction

classitems.description: Gets a list of applications.
classitems.name: getEntitiesAction

props.name: query
props.description: Search query to search on application name

props.name: page
props.description: The expected page in pagination system

props.name: limit
props.description: The maximum number of expected results

props.name: sortBy
props.description: To sort by property name (only "name" is available right now)

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets an instance of the entity model associated to the controller.
classitems.name: getModel

classitems.description: Retrieves, recursively, the permission corresponding to the couple url / http method.
classitems.name: getPermissionByUrl

params.name: httpMethod
params.description: The http method (POST, GET, PUT, DELETE)

return.description: The permission id if found, null otherwise

classitems.description:
Checks if asked page is the user profile.

All users must have access to its profile.
classitems.name: isUserProfileUrl

params.name: request
params.description: The express request object handled by the server

props.name: locked
props.description: true if user is locked, false otherwise

return.description: true if the page is the user profile page, false otherwise

classitems.description:
Establishes requests authentication using module passport.

If authentication fails, an HTTP code 401 is returned to the client.
If authentication succeeds, an HTTP code 200 is returned to the
client with user information as a JSON Object.
classitems.name: authenticateAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Removes requests authentication, requests are not authenticated
anymore.

An HTTP code 200 is returned to the client with no content.
classitems.name: logoutAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Checks if current request is authenticated.

If not send back an HTTP code 401 with appropriate page.
It just get to the next route action if permission is granted.
classitems.name: restrictAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets the tree of groups / permissions and return it as a JSON object.
classitems.name: getPermissionsAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Handles back office default action to display main HTML.

If no other action were performed display the main back
office template.
Configuration files of the openveo plugin and openveo sub plugins
are used to retrieve the list of files to load within the template.
JavaScript libraries, JavaScript files and CSS files.
classitems.name: defaultAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Handles requests which does not correspond to anything.
classitems.name: notFoundAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Handles all errors.
classitems.name: errorAction

props.name: httCode
props.description: The code HTTP to return for this error

props.name: module
props.description: The name of the plugin the error belongs to

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Handles forgotten requests.

Depending on request Accept HTTP header, either an HTML content,
a JSON content or a text content will be returned with a 404 code.
classitems.name: notFoundPageAction

classitems.description: Gets a list of groups.
classitems.name: getEntitiesAction

props.name: query
props.description: Search query to search on both group's name and description

props.name: page
props.description: The expected page in pagination system

props.name: limit
props.description: The maximum number of expected results

props.name: sortBy
props.description: To sort by property name (either "name" or "description")

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets an instance of the entity model associated to the controller.
classitems.name: getModel

classitems.description: Gets a public dictionary of translations by its name.
classitems.name: getDictionaryAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Gets a dictionary, with restricted access, by its name.

To restrict access to the dictionary, all dictionaries with
restricted access must be prefixed by "admin-".
If no dictionary is found, a JSON 404 Not Found response is send back
to the client.
classitems.name: getAdminDictionaryAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Checks if user has the given permission.
classitems.name: isAuthorized

classitems.description:
Filters the given menu depending on user permissions and requested
menu items permissions.
classitems.name: filterMenuByPermissions

classitems.description:
Gets the backend menu as a JSON object.

If menu is empty a 404 Not Found is sent.
Menu is filtered regarding user permissions.
classitems.name: getMenuAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Retrieves, from list of scopes, the scope corresponding to the couple url / http method.
classitems.name: getScopeByUrl

params.name: httpMethod
params.description: The http method (POST, GET, PUT, DELETE)

return.description: The scope id if found, null otherwise

classitems.description:
Validates scopes for the given token depending on requested url.

Revoke access to the service if client does not have permission.
classitems.name: validateScopesAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Gets a list of roles.

Parameters :
 - **query** Search query to search in role names
 - **page** The expected page
 - **limit** The expected limit
 - **sortOrder** Sort order (either asc or desc)
classitems.name: getEntitiesAction

props.description: The maximum number of expected results

props.name: page
props.description: The expected page in pagination system

props.name: sortBy
props.description: The name of the property on which to sort (only "name" is available)

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

props.name: query

props.description: The expected page in pagination system

props.name: limit
props.description: The maximum number of expected results

props.name: sortBy
props.description: To sort by property name (only "name" is available right now)

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Updates a user.
classitems.name: updateEntityAction

props.name: id
props.description: Id of the user to update

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets an instance of the entity model associated to the controller.
classitems.name: getModel

classitems.description: Builds entities for plugins.
classitems.name: buildEntities

return.description: The list of entities, for plugins, ordered by plugin name

throws.description: A TypeError if plugins is not an array

classitems.description: Builds CRUD routes for entities.
classitems.name: buildEntitiesRoutes

return.description: The list of routes for all entities

classitems.description:
The list of socket controllers path with associated controller instance.

It is used to instantiate each controller only once.
classitems.name: controllers

classitems.description: Attaches handlers to namespace.
classitems.name: addHandlers

params.name: messagesDescriptors
params.description: A list of socket namespace messages with associated controller / action

params.name: pluginPath
params.description:
The root path of the plugin associated to the namespace used to find controllers
associated to messages

classitems.description:
Makes sure all permissions of a plugin are prefixed by the name of the plugin.

If a permission is not prefixed by the name of the plugin, the prefix is automatically added.
classitems.name: prefixPermissions

classitems.description:
Generates add/update/delete permissions for entities.

Permission's translation keys for name and description are generated using the formats
"PERMISSIONS.{PLUGIN_NAME}_{OPERATION}_{ENTITY_NAME}_NAME" and
"PERMISSIONS.{PLUGIN_NAME}_{OPERATION}_{ENTITY_NAME}_DESCRIPTION".

Content entities won't generate any permissions.
classitems.name: generateEntityPermissions

params.name: pluginsEntities
params.description: The list of entities ordered by plugins

classitems.description: Builds entities' scopes.
classitems.name: generateEntityScopes

return.description: The list of web service scopes for all entities exposed by all plugins

classitems.description:
Generates permissions using groups.

Permission's translation keys for name and description are generated
using the formats "GROUP_{OPERATION}_NAME" and
"{GROUP}_{OPERATION}_DESCRIPTION".
classitems.name: generateGroupPermissions

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when its done with :
 - **Array** The list of group permissions

classitems.description: Creates permissions for a group.
classitems.name: createGroupPermissions

throws.description: An error if required parameters are not specified

classitems.description: Reorganizes orphaned top permissions into a generic group.
classitems.name: groupOrphanedPermissions

params.name: permissions
params.description:
The list of permissions with group
permissions and eventually orphaned permission not attached to any group

return.description:
The same list of permissions except that orphaned
permissions are extracted into a generic group

throws.description: An error if permissions is not a valid array

classitems.description: Builds the list of scopes.
classitems.name: buildScopes

classitems.description:
Builds the list of permissions.

add/delete/update permissions are generated for each entity and get/update/delete permissions are
created for each group.

Orphaned permissions are grouped in a generic group of permissions.
classitems.name: buildPermissions

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when its done with :
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong
 - **Array** The list of generated persmissions

classitems.description:
Filters the list of plugins paths in case the same plugin appears
multiple time at different paths. Filters to keep only the most
top level one.
classitems.name: filterPluginsPaths

params.name: pluginsPaths
params.description: The list of plugins paths to analyze

return.description: The filtered list of plugins paths

classitems.description:
Recursively and asynchronously analyze the given directory to get
npm plugins.

There are two kinds of plugins : plugins maintained by the core team (under @openveo scope)
and contributers' plugins which must be prefixed by **openveo-**.
classitems.name: getPluginPaths

params.name: startingPath
params.description: Root path of an NPM module from where looking for plugins

params.name: callback
params.description:
A callback with two arguments :
   - **Error** An Error object or null
   - **Array** The list of plugins paths

throws.description: An error if starting path is not a valid string

classitems.description:
Recursively and asynchronously load all offical and contributed OpenVeo plugins under the given path.

If the same plugin (same name) is encountered several times, the top level one
will be kept.
classitems.name: loadPlugins

params.name: startingPath
params.description: Root path of an NPM module from where looking for plugins

params.name: callback
params.description:
A callback with two arguments :
   - **Error** An Error object or null
   - **Array** A list of Plugin objects

throws.description: An error if starting path is not a valid string

classitems.description: Loads a single plugin by its path.
classitems.name: loadPlugin

params.name: pluginPath
params.description: Absolute path to the plugin directory

params.name: callback
params.description:
A callback with two arguments :
   - **Error** An Error object or null
   - **Plugin** The loaded plugin or null

throws.description: An error if plugin path or starting path is not a valid string

classitems.description: Loads plugin's configuration.
classitems.name: loadPluginMetadata

params.name: callback
params.description:
A callback with :
   - **Error** An Error if something went wrong

classitems.description:
Gets the list of routes from a route configuration object with,
for each one, the method, the path and the action to call.
classitems.name: decodeRoutes

params.name: pluginPath
params.description: The root path of the plugin associated to the routes

throws.description: If one of the route controllers is not a Controller

classitems.description: Applies a list of routes to a router.
classitems.name: applyRoutes

params.name: routes
params.description: The list of routes to apply

params.name: router
params.description: An express router to attach the routes to

classitems.description: Saves in core_system table the last migration successfull done.
classitems.name: saveMigrationVersion

params.name: version
params.description: Version of the script successfully executed

params.name: callback
params.description:
callback A callback with 1 arguments :
   - **Error** An Error object or null

classitems.description: Creates async series according to migration script order.
classitems.name: createMigrationSeries

return.description: Array of synchronous function to execute

classitems.description: Executes a collection of migration script.
classitems.name: executeMigrationScript

params.name: migrations
callback
params.description:
A callback with 1 arguments :
   - **Error** An Error object or null

classitems.description: Adds a new client to the clients' collection.
classitems.name: add

props.name: id
props.description: Client's id, if not specified id is generated

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The inserted client

classitems.description: Updates client application.
classitems.name: update

params.name: data
params.description: The client with all properties to update

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of updated items

classitems.description:
Adds a new group.

Each time a new group is added, 3 new permissions are created create/update/delete and organized in a group of
permissions.
classitems.name: add

props.name: id
props.description: Group's id, if not specified id is generated

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The added entity

classitems.description:
Updates a group.

Each time a group is modified, the list of permissions is updated.
classitems.name: update

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the entity to update

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of updated items

classitems.description:
Removes one or several groups.

Each time a group is removed, the list of permissions is updated.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: ids
params.description: Id(s) of the document(s) to remove from the collection

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of deleted entities

classitems.description: Adds a new role.
classitems.name: add

props.name: id
props.description: Role's id, if not specified id is generated

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The inserted role

classitems.name: getByIds

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Array** The list of roles

Adds a new token.

The function to call when it's done

  - **Object** The inserted token

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of deleted tokens

classitems.name: getTokenByValue

params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Object** The fetched token

classitems.description: Gets a user by credentials.
classitems.name: getUserByCredentials

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Object** The user

  - **Number** The number of updated items

with :

classitems.description:
Gets a dictionary of translations by its name and language.

Search is made on i18n directory and all plugin's i18n directories.
If the same dictionary name is found twice (same file name in different i18n directories),
dictionaries are merged.

The name of the dictionary, this is the name of the dictionary file without
extension

Function to call when its done

 - **Object** A JavaScript object containing all translations

classitems.description: Validates a path regarding a rule.
example:
var path = process.require("app/server/path.js");
    path.validate("get /test", "get /test"); // true
    path.validate("get /test", "/test"); // true
    path.validate("get /test", "/*"); // true
    path.validate("get /test", "*"); // true
    path.validate("post /test", "post /test"); // true
    path.validate("put /test", "put /test"); // true
    path.validate("delete /test", "delete /test"); // true
    path.validate("/test", "/test"); // true
    path.validate("get /test", ""); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "/"); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "/other"); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "post /test"); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "post"); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "get"); // false
    path.validate("get /test", "unknwon /test"); // false
classitems.name: validate

params.name: String
params.description: rule The rule to validate path

return.description:
true if the rule validates the path, false
otherwise
